info.brief_description: this is a vore-based interactive, the basis being: dogs!
info.description:
this interactive is mainly for vore. if you either don't know what this is, or don't like what this is, then leave immediately.

now that that is out of the way...

this is an interactive based on doggy vore. in other words dogs are prominent. it can be almost any dog and they can either be pred, prey, or assistant in the vore situations.

I'd prefer a dog be a part in most of the vore, even if they aren't being vored or voreing, though, that is not a strict rule, and as long as most vore has the doggies, then I'll permit some other as well.

again, I won't allow female vore under almost any circumstance. if you really want a female character in this, send me an e-mail. also, if you have any questions, send me an e-mail.

All male-vore is acceptable, but the doggy-door in the title is referencing AV, and it is the one I'd prefer. there is no rule against not using AV, it's just the one I prefer in this story.

the dogs used may be from any show, though please list the show when putting him down, and preferably a link to the wikipedia page for the show, if at all possible. also, any dog may crossover into any other show. if the show already has a link on a starting page, then it isn't necessary to make one when crossing over.

oh, and for the sake of quick-referencing, please make the title of chapters where you choose a dog to have the dog's name as the title, in case he shows up elsewhere and other's want to know his show, in case they already do not.

sorry for all the rules and guidelines... now, on to the main event!
